block.p: GREENBERG-Emanuel (Mannie). Beloved husband and lifetime best friend of Madeline (nee Rosenthal), loving father of David, father-in-law of Abby, grandfather of Jacob and Simon and brother of Saul. WWII Merchant Seaman and active union member. Writer of books and magazine articles about food and drink. Died May 3, 2000 at age 83 after a long and profoundly courageous fight with Parkinsons Disease. We have missed you for so long and will never forget you and your deep love for us. Services Sunday, May 7, 2:30 PM at Congregation Beth Elohim, 8th Ave. and Garfield Pl., Park Slope, Brooklyn.
